attributes.additional_details: If we go to school 30 hours a week then why should we need to do homework. Going to school is draining and i don’t think we need that extra work because it makes it hard to have your own time when you are constantly being set homework!
attributes.background: We go to school 6 hours a day and even that’s draining, we don’t need even more work to do when we get home!

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban homework except for GCSE coursework: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637387

Ban primary schools from setting homework: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636943
